title: eCommerceBanner
challenge: Designing a dynamic and visually appealing eCommerce banner system that could adapt to various campaigns, support multilingual content, and work seamlessly across devices and screen sizes.
approach: We developed a modular Laravel-based backend with Tailwind-powered frontend components. By implementing reusable Vue components and conditional rendering logic, we created an easily manageable and scalable system for marketing teams.

title: Expleo
challenge: Creating a secure internal platform for an enterprise client to manage audits, workflows, and document versioning across multiple departments with role-based access.
approach: We implemented a multi-role permission system using Laravel's Gates and Policies, with frontend components optimized for clarity and speed. Audit trails and activity logs ensured compliance, while Tailwind ensured design consistency.
